item.title: Kim Harvey Will Take Reins of ‘CBS Evening News’ as Executive Producer
item.description: Kim Harvey will oversee “CBS Evening News” as its next executive producer, a switch that could augur new changes for the venerable program after it lost viewers while experimenting with an
